name: Plum Blossom Divination
description: This is a game that helps customers calculate divination in a small town using the ancient Chinese technique "Plum Blossom Divination". The game includes knowledge of the Five Elements, Eight Trigrams, Diagrams Songs, Yao Songs, and Representative items of the Eight Trigrams.Players can use three methods: Year Month Day Divination,Sound Divination,and Character Divination to help people in the small town calculate divination. There are also some puzzles related to the various phenomena of the Eight Trigrams in the small town, helping players understand and learn "Plum Blossom Divination". You can also experience small town life, such as renting a house, buying a house, purchasing food and drink, clothing, purchasing furniture, and customizing rooms. Come and learn about the charm of traditional Chinese culture.
